1012420.name: Fantasy Grounds - Monstrous Lairs #12 to #15: Medusas, Aboleth, Lizardfolk, and Bandits (Any Ruleset)
1012420.description:
Monstrous Lairs #12 to #15: Medusas, Aboleth, Lizardfolk, and Bandits

Monstrous Lair #12: Medusa Lair provides you--the busy, time-crunched GM--with the details to effortlessly bring to life the dark creeper villages in your campaign.
  • 7 rollable tables
  • 1 Story Template to generate the medusa's lair in one click
  • Reference manual
Monstrous Lair #13: Aboleth's Sunken Cavern provides you--the busy, time-crunched GM--with the details to effortlessly bring to life the aboleth lairs in your campaign.
  • 7 rollable tables
  • 1 Story Template to generate the medusa's lair in one click
  • Reference manual
Monstrous Lair #14: Lizardfolk Village provides you--the busy, time-crunched GM--with the details to effortlessly bring to life the lizardfolk villages in your campaign.
  • 7 rollable tables
  • 1 Story Template to generate the medusa's lair in one click
  • Reference manual
Monstrous Lair #15: Bandit Campprovides you--the busy, time-crunched GM--with the details to effortlessly bring to life the bandit camps in your campaign.
Are you a busy GM? Does session prep take too long? Do you never have time to work on the cool little details that can bring your adventures, dungeons and campaign to life? This short, focused compilation gives you, the time-crunched GM, the tools to effortlessly add verisimilitude and detail to your dungeons. Use the material herein either before or during play and bask in your players' adulation.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Michael Potter
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
